sys_hub_flow.description: Once the request is submitted, we would like to automate the creation of a vehicle tracker as well as all activities associated with the request process such as approval and delivery. The flow should be triggered when the Service Catalog is submitted. A Vehicle Tracker containing information from the catalog item is automatically created. An approval to the Loaner Vehicle Approver group is attached to the RITM ticket. Once at least one approver approves, a Delivery task is created and assigned to the Vehicle Delivery Group. Once the delivery task is closed, the RITM ticket needs to be closed.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name,

The vehicle request you entered or requested on your behalf has been canceled.

 

Thank you,

1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name
Important Notes on returning the vehicle requested on {{Service Catalog_1.request_item.number}}

sys_hub_flow_snapshot.description: Once the request is submitted, we would like to automate the creation of a vehicle tracker as well as all activities associated with the request process such as approval and delivery. The flow should be triggered when the Service Catalog is submitted. A Vehicle Tracker containing information from the catalog item is automatically created. An approval to the Loaner Vehicle Approver group is attached to the RITM ticket. Once at least one approver approves, a Delivery task is created and assigned to the Vehicle Delivery Group. Once the delivery task is closed, the RITM ticket needs to be closed.

Thank you,
